channel.title: Running a 317 server
channel.description: hi everyone iv runned a few servers in the past and wanna do it again case its alot of fun im an ok coder not the best =p i have no clue what 317 or when it came out been about 5 months since i hosted a server i have a huge server that prob could run anything out there thats empty and ready to be used and if anyone could exsplain to me about the whole 317 thing thats going on or what changes that have been made to client.java to make this thing happen id be very gratefull =D

item.title: Running a 317 server
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

zane02:

Hello its a ? mark so oviously i dont know. Besides it might be one in the future anyway, so doesnt really matter it could just be a wave of the future. 0.o

You’re just an idiot. That’s all I ahve to say. Plus, your signature is pathetic, because you can’t get your own runescape account.

item.title: Running a 317 server
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

zane02:

525, 517, and 596 i think? are some other ones.

Where the hell did you get 596 from?

xxxxxx 13:

ok. 317 508. are the main two. these refer to the client graphics etc. 508 is the updated rs graphics. The files look completely different in reference to order. 317 is probably what you are used to. You cant just change a file to make your server go from 317 to 508. atleast not yet. im sure its coming. lol.

Seems to me that you’ve never seen a packaged server before?

Read full topic
